attributes.action: to stop the use of petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the undersigned suggest that petitions should be banned in this country because it gives the old people something to do. our slogan is "Stop the petitioners petitioning through petitions"

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
